PageInfo.Message:
【<KC UI_GAME_MENU>】Game Menu《Character》
From <COL ffdc78>Status/Equipment</COL> in the
Character menu,
you can switch equipment and check its details.
Equipment can be equipped on different body parts
such as the head, arms, and torso,
and it greatly affects your strength and health.
You can purchase equipment at shops like the
Equipment Shop.

You are limited in the items you can equip based
on your job, level, and gender.
<COL ffdc78>It is important to equip weapons and
armor that match your job and level.</COL>
Make sure to carefully check the parameters of
each item and go on an adventure with the best
equipment.
